foodTruckDescription: We have a food truck, our Sa Gulita on wheels. It is available for events, parties, and weddings. Wherever and whenever you want!
cateringDescription: You can contact us to arrange catering for private events, parties, or weddings. We also make cakes by prior order.
privateChefDescription: Our chef Gerard Vilanova, specialized in Mediterranean and vegetarian cuisine, has 5 years of experience working as a private chef on the island. You can contact us for more information. He adapts to the client's needs.
